item.title: Swiss Watch Exports to US Fall for First Time in Over Two Years
item.description: Swiss Watch Exports to US Fall for First Time in Over Two Years Swiss watch exports to the United States fell by 4.9% in April 2023, marking the first decline in more than two years. The decline comes as the US economy faces headwinds from inflation, rising interest rates, and supply chain disruptions.
